title: Deathstars: Complete Discography [320kbps + Videos]
description:
=================================================================
DEATHSTARS
=================================================================

IMPORTANT: PLEASE READ INFORMATION CAREFULLY BEFORE DOWNLOADING.

All tracks ripped off audio CD except for:

Blitzkrieg [Driven On Remix]
Black Medicine
Razor End

The above tracks are at 192kbps.

All tracks except for the above are at 320kbps, ripped from audio CDs by me.

This upload is designed to be iPod friendly. All ID3 Tags are already filled in, all music videos are in .mp4 format at 320x240 ratio for iPods that support video.

Please seed once downloaded.

And BUY if you like it.

=================================================================

DEMO [2000-2003]

[Note: These songs were never oficially released]

01 Black Medicine
02 Razor End

=================================================================

SYNTHETIC GENERATION [2003]

01 Semi-Automatic
02 Synthetic Generation
03 New Dead Nation
04 Syndrome
05 Modern Death
06 Little Angel
07 The Revolution Exodus
08 Damn Me
09 The Rape
10 Genocide
11 No Light

LIMITED EDITION - COLOURED ENHANCED CD

Bonus Tracks:

12 White Wedding [Billy Idol Cover]
13 Our God, The Drugs

Music Videos:

14 Synthetic Generation
15 Syndrome

=================================================================

TERMINATION BLISS [2006]

01 Tongues
02 Blitzkrieg
03 Motherzone
04 Cyanide
05 Greatest Fight On Earth
06 Play God
07 Trinity Fields
08 The Last Ammunition
09 Virtue To Vice
10 Death In Vogue
11 Termination Bliss

SLIPCASE EDITION - BONUS TRACKS

12 Termination Bliss [Piano Remix]*
13 Blitzkrieg [Driven On Remix]

EXTENDED VERSION - BONUS DVD

Bonus Track:

12 Termination Bliss [Piano Version]

Music Videos (Bonus DVD)**:

01 Virtue To Vice
02 The Making Of "Virtue To Vice"
03 Blitzkrieg
04 The Making Of "Blitzkrieg"
05 Cyanide
06 The Making Of "Cyanide"

*The "Piano Remix" of Termination Bliss was later renamed to "Piano Version" and appeared on the Extended Version of the album. Only the Piano Version is included in this torrent.

**The Termination Bliss Extended Version bonus DVD also includes the videos for Synthetic Generation and Syndrome.

=================================================================

NIGHT ELECTRIC NIGHT [2009]

01 Chertograd
02 Night Electric Night
03 Death Dies Hard
04 Mark Of The Gun
05 Via The End
06 Blood Stains Blonds
07 Babylon
08 The Fuel Ignites
09 Arclight
10 Venus In Arms
11 Opium

GOLD EDITION - BONUS DVD

Bonus Tracks:

12 Night Electric Night [The Night Ignites Remix]
13 Via The End [Piano Version]
14 Night Electric Night [ft. Adrian Erlandsson]

Music Videos (Bonus DVD)***:

01 Death Dies Hard
02 The Making Of "Death Dies Hard"

***The Night Electric Night Gold Edition bonus DVD also includes the videos of Synthetic Generation, Syndrome, Virtue To Vice, Blitzkrieg and Cyanide.

=================================================================

Please buy these albums if you like them; they're worth every single penny. Keep rocking, Deathstars!
